Just to reconfirm what others have said before.Blavis is a little out of the way, but the care put into the selection of food (and wine) is second to none. Unpretentious,  hole-in-the-wall it may be, but the food is superb. We had a fabulous meal for two with 5 tapas choices, plus great wine and dessert for €80. It is becoming,  or has become, famous. Book well ahead!  Credit cards (master and visa) accepted.
